short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add speed reading and media speed controls on all pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more watching training videos in slo-mo!
No more slowly combing through long emails or documentation

This small extension adds quick and easy hotkeys and a simple, minimal GUI that allow you to add media controls to websites that may have them locked or hidden such as university lectures, workplace training videos and Spotify.

It also incorporates a speed-reader linked to your OS clipboard that will allow you to up your reading speed on any written content in browser or otherwise up to 1000 words per minute!

Key features

=> Media control on most websites/platforms
=> Speed reader linked to clipboard
=> Simple and efficient hotkeys
=> Speed reader works with email platforms
=> No data ever leaves your machine!
